name: Backstabbr Improvement
description: Fixes and tweaks a lot of things for the Backstabbr site.
additional_info:
2018/12/21
- Adjusted the position of the sorting arrows to left side of the text, instead of the far right side of the column
- Adjusted the position of the +/- inside the game info drop-down toggle icon
- Fixed the "Games You're Playing" table to be the same style as every other table
- Fixed the double border on the far right edge of all tables
- Made the tooltip hover text box on the map easier to read (White text with black border)
- Fixed the Press thread and Compose overflow section to be consistent at different browser widths
- Added some spacing between the Press list and the "Load more messages" button
- Added some Webkit scrollbars (because the default browser  scrollbars are gross)
- Made the footer a fixed position, made it slightly smaller, and gave it a drop shadow

2018/12/06
- Removed changes to press threads because the backstabbr devs incorporated them onto the main site!!

2018/12/04
- Added space between sorting arrows on home page
- Stopped the press text box area from turning text grey when the text box is selected

2018/11/19
- Posted original style sheet.
